justification: They note Team B’s desire for floor and TE depth, but misread player profiles: Trey Mitchell and Darian Anderson aren’t high-floor archetypes for B, and B prefers workhorse RBs/possession WRs. Asking for Justin Wright (Tier 5, Out) as a “stud TE” is incorrect, especially since Team A already has a Tier 1 TE. The trade is feasible but incoherent with A’s aims and B’s preferences. Rationale is brief and factually off.
